Class JsonUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.itemscript.core.util.JsonUtil

public final class JsonUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility methods for working with JSON values.

Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org

Constructor Detail

JsonUtil

public JsonUtil()
Method Detail

arrayToObjectList

public static java.util.List<JsonObject> arrayToObjectList(JsonArray array)
Take the given JsonArray, and return a List corresponding to it, where any values that are not of type JsonObject will be null.

Parameters:
array - The JsonArray to process.
Returns:
A JsonArray of JsonObjects.

arrayToStringList

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> arrayToStringList(JsonArray array)
Take the given JsonArray, and return a List corresponding to it, where any values that are not of type JsonString will be null.

Parameters:
array - The JsonArray to process.
Returns:
A list of strings.

htmlEncode

public static java.lang.String htmlEncode(java.lang.String input)
HTML-encode a string. This simple method only replaces the five characters &, <, >, ", and '.

Parameters:
input - the String to convert
Returns:
a new String with HTML encoded characters

isEven

public static boolean isEven(int i)
Returns true if the supplied int is even, false if it is odd.

Parameters:
i - The number to test.
Returns:
True if the number was even, false if it was odd.

join

public static java.lang.String join(java.util.List<java.lang.String> strings,
                                    java.lang.String join)
Join a list of strings with the given joining string.

Parameters:
strings - The strings to join.
join - The string to join them with, or null if no string is to be used.
Returns:
The string consisting of the strings joined together.

stringMapToObject

public static JsonObject stringMapToObject(JsonSystem system,
                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> map)
Take a Map and return a new JsonObject corresponding to it, where keys in the original map will be keys in the JsonObject and values in the original map will be JsonString values in the JsonObject.

Parameters:
system - The associated JsonSystem.
map - The map containing strings.
Returns:
A JsonObject.

toHtmlJson

public static java.lang.String toHtmlJson(JsonValue value)
Convert the supplied JsonValue to a pretty-printed HTML representation, using the default color map.

Parameters:
value - The value to convert.
Returns:
An HTML string.

toHtmlJson

public static java.lang.String toHtmlJson(JsonValue value,
                                          JsonObject colorMap)
Convert the supplied JsonValue to a pretty-printed HTML string, using the supplied color map.

Parameters:
value - The value to convert.
colorMap - The color map to use; see JsonUtil for constants to use as keys in the map.
Returns:
An HTML string.
